title: Sucking Up In Class
overview: Chanel Preston is angry. Her daughter, Scarlett, is a straight-A student but since she started taking Charlotte Stokely's class, her grades have dropped to a C. During a parent-teacher conference, Charlotte explains to Chanel how she will pass her daughter in her class, but under one condition. Charlotte Stokely is teaching her class about the birds and the bees. Scarlett Sage and Alex More are young, naughty teenagers who can't help but pass each other perverted notes. Upset with the girls interruptions, Charlotte informs them that she will have to speak with their parents. After class, Scarlett and Alex decide to negotiate an alternative with their teacher, perhaps one of the naked variety! Sex-obsessed Ashley Adams loves to be bold and go out in public without wearing panties and today is no exception. Constantly sneaking glances at Jayden Cole, the hot librarian Ashley asks her for some one-on-one help and gets a better service than she could have expected!
